data.eml:eml: A new species of Stephonyx (Amphipoda, Amphilochida, Lysianassoidea) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sorrentino, Rayane, Souza-Filho, Jesser F., Senna, André R. (2018): A new species of Stephonyx (Amphipoda, Amphilochida, Lysianassoidea) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4388 (4): 537-546, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4388.4.5
